Room.Name: Sage's Rest
Room.ShortDescription: The wide gravel path of white rock passes in front of the Sage's Rest.
Room.LongDescription: The granite and pink marble, gridded with silver and gold, has an entrance where there is a staircase descending into darkness. Although it looks like an expensive tomb, there is something about its appearance that pulls at your curosity. Something about it seems out of place, almost turned around. Whatever it is, it's very disturbing. The entrance is north.
